original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: The perfection of generosity

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the entityness of the perfection of generosity.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni /
translated: Inner emptiness

original: nang @178a */ stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: nang @178a */ stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the entityness of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid ni /
translated: Outer emptiness

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the entityness of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ni /
translated: Inner and outer emptiness

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the entityness of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni /
translated: Emptiness of emptiness

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the entityness of emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid ni /
translated: Great emptiness

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the entityness of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid ni /
translated: Ultimate emptiness

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the entityness of ultimate emptiness.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni /
translated: Emptiness of the compounded

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the entityness of emptiness of the compounded.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni; 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni; 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is isolated from the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni /🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no /🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is isolated from the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of what is not to be discarded is isolated from the emptiness of what is not to be discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of nature is isolated from the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is isolated from the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: The emptiness of its own mark is isolated from the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension🔽is isolated from the emptiness of non-apprehension.🔽The emptiness of non-entities🔽is isolated from the emptiness of non-entities.🔽The emptiness of own-marks

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the emptiness of own-marks.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: dngos po med @178b pa stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dngos po med @178b pa stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽The emptiness of the ultimate🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The emptiness of the inestimable

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the emptiness of the inestimable.🔽The emptiness of the past🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the past.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of the future🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the future.🔽The emptiness of the present

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the emptiness of the present.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni /
translated: The emptiness of the inconceivable🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the inconceivable.🔽The emptiness of the unapprehendable

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni /
translated: is isolated from the emptiness of the unapprehendable.🔽The emptiness of the unproduced🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the unproduced.🔽The emptiness of the non-destroyed🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the non-destroyed.🔽The emptiness of essential nature

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is isolated from the emptiness of essential nature.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams ni /
translated: The emptiness of all things🔽is isolated from the emptiness of all things.🔽The emptiness of specific characteristics

original: yang dag par spong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni /
translated: is isolated from the emptiness of specific characteristics.🔽The emptiness of the non-apprehension of things🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the non-apprehension of things.🔽The emptiness of the inherent existence of non-things🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the inherent existence of non-things.🔽The emptiness of the inherent existence of things🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the inherent existence of things.🔽The emptiness of the inherent existence of non-things

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no /🔽dbang po rnams ni /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no /🔽dbang po rnams ni /
translated: is isolated from the emptiness of the inherent existence of non-things.🔽The emptiness of the ultimate🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The emptiness of the conditioned🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the conditioned.🔽The emptiness of the unconditioned🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the unconditioned.🔽The emptiness of the past🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the past.🔽The emptiness of the future🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the future.🔽The emptiness of the present🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the present.🔽The emptiness of the inconceivable🔽is isolated from the emptiness of the inconceivable.

original: dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽stobs rnams ni /
analyzed: dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // stobs rnams ni /
translated: The faculties are isolated from the intrinsic nature of the faculties.

original: stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni /
analyzed: stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni /
translated: The powers are isolated from the intrinsic nature of the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni /
translated: The branches of awakening are isolated from the intrinsic nature of the branches of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni /🔽'phags pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no; ;bsam gtan rnams ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni / 'phags pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no; ;bsam gtan rnams ni /
translated: The noble eightfold path is isolated from the intrinsic nature of the noble eightfold path.🔽The truths are isolated from the intrinsic nature of the truths.

original: bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽tshad med pa rnams ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // tshad med pa rnams ni /
translated: The concentrations are isolated from the intrinsic nature of the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni /
analyzed: tshad med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni /
translated: The immeasurables are isolated from the intrinsic nature of the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽rnam par thar pa brgyad ni /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no // rnam par thar pa brgyad ni /
translated: The formless absorptions are isolated from the intrinsic nature of the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i @179a *//
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //🔽mthar gyis gnas pa'i @179a *//
translated: The eight deliverances are isolated from the intrinsic nature of the eight deliverances.🔽The nine serial absorptions are isolated from the intrinsic nature of the nine serial absorptions.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni /
translated: The nine serial absorptions

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: are empty of the essence of the nine serial absorptions.🔽The emptiness gate to liberation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni /
translated: the signless gate to liberation, and the wishless gate to liberation

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: are empty of the essence of the emptiness gate to liberation, the signless gate to liberation, and the wishless gate to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni /
translated: The clairvoyances

original: mngon par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no /
translated: are empty of the essence of the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni /
translated: The meditative stabilizations

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: are empty of the essence of the meditative stabilizations.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: are empty of the essence of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni /
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: are empty of the essence of the ten powers of the tathāgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni /
translated: The four fearlessnesses

original: mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no; ;so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no; ;so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni /
translated: are empty of the essence of the four fearlessnesses. The four detailed and thorough knowledges🔽are empty of the essence of the four detailed and thorough knowledges.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: and the analytical knowledges are empty of the essential nature of the analytical knowledges.

original: snying rje chen po ni /
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni /
translated: Great compassion

original: snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: is empty of the essential nature of great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni /
translated: The eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no //
translated: are empty of the essential nature of the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha.

original: zhes bya bar shes na /
analyzed: zhes bya bar shes na /
translated: If you know this,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des dben pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des dben pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste /
translated: then, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings should practice the perfection of wisdom that is empty in this way.

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: gzhan yang @179b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo na /
analyzed: gzhan yang @179b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo na /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, when the bodhisattva great beings dedicate those wholesome roots of those buddha bhagavāns who have passed into parinirvāṇa together with their śrāvaka saṅghas,

original: 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
translated: they should dedicate them like this:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i de dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i de dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: Those wholesome roots are also completely extinguished in the same way that those Buddhas, those Exalted Ones, are completely extinguished.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba 'di'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji lta ba de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba 'di'ang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
translated: Just as those wholesome roots are, so also is this dedication completely extinguished.

original: sems gang gis bsngo ba'i sems de'ang de dang tshul mthun te /
analyzed: sems gang gis bsngo ba'i sems de'ang de dang tshul mthun te /
translated: And the mind by which one dedicates is also of the same kind,

original: de'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: having that very nature.

original: zhes gal te de ltar shes na /
analyzed: zhes gal te de ltar shes na /
translated: If one knows it in this way,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin te /
translated: then it is a dedication to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ltar yongs su bsngos na /
analyzed: de ltar yongs su bsngos na /
translated: When it is dedicated in this way,

original: 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: there is no mistaken perception.

original: sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: There is no mistaken mind.

original: lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: There is no mistaken view.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mtshan ma'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su shes na /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe mtshan ma'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su shes na /
translated: If, when the bodhisattva great being practices the perfection of wisdom, he were to cognize those wholesome roots of those lord buddhas by way of a causal sign,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no //
translated: then he would not dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag kyang mtshan ma ma yin /
analyzed: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag kyang mtshan ma ma yin /
translated: Those lord buddhas of the past are not causal signs,

original: mtshan ma'i yul ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i yul ma yin no //
translated: not an object of a causal sign.

original: zhes gal te de ltar sems @180a *//
analyzed: zhes gal te de ltar sems @180a *//
translated: If he thinks like that,

original: na'ang mtshan mar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: na'ang mtshan mar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: he is making causal signs.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te /
translated: He does not dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ltar na; de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na; de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro //
translated: In that way, his perception is distorted,

original: sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro //
translated: his thought is distorted,

original: lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro //
translated: his view is distorted.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag yongs su shes pa med cing /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag yongs su shes pa med cing /
translated: If bodhisattva great beings do not know those buddha bhagavāns, those wholesome roots, those formative activities, and those arousals of mind,

original: mtshan mar mi byed na /
analyzed: mtshan mar mi byed na /
translated: and do not make them into signs,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin te /
translated: then those wholesome roots are dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In that way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the perception of bodhisattva great beings does not become distorted,

original: sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: their minds do not become distorted,

original: lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and their views do not become distorted.

original: byams pas smras pa /
analyzed: byams pas smras pa /
translated: Maitreya said,

original: btsun pa rab 'byor /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: ji ltar na; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing /
analyzed: ji ltar na; byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing /
translated: how is it that bodhisattva great beings do not make those wholesome roots into signs,🔽and

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin; rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin; rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la thabs mkhas pa de dag bslab par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la thabs mkhas pa de dag bslab par bya ste /
translated: “Bodhisattva great beings should train in those skillful means in this perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab @180b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab @180b kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa rig par bya'o //
translated: In this perfection of wisdom the skillful means of bodhisattva great beings should be known.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: Without relying on the perfection of wisdom it is not possible to dedicate the thing that is the basis of merit.

original: byams pas smras pa /
analyzed: byams pas smras pa /
translated: Maitreya said,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de mi dmigs so //
translated: “Those lord buddhas are not in the perfection of wisdom, and cannot be apprehended.

original: zhes bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang med de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang med de mi dmigs so //
translated: And those wholesome roots are not, and cannot be apprehended.

original: zhes bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang med de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang med de mi dmigs so //
translated: And, “Those compositional activities do not exist and are not apprehended.”

original: zhes bya ba dang / gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag kyang med de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag kyang med de mi dmigs so //
translated: And, “Those arousings of the mind that are dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening do not exist and are not apprehended.”

original: zhes bya ba 'di skyon du smras par mi 'gyur ram snyam na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di skyon du smras par mi 'gyur ram snyam na /
translated: Do you think that this is not a fault?

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: In that regard, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should investigate as follows:

original: bdag gi lus de dag kyang 'gags par gyur /
analyzed: bdag gi lus de dag kyang 'gags par gyur /
translated: “Those bodies of mine have ceased.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'gags par gyur /🔽mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang 'gags par gyur /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'gags par gyur / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag kyang 'gags par gyur /
translated: Those wholesome roots have ceased.🔽Those compositional activities have ceased.

original: sems bskyed pa de dag kyang 'gags par gyur na /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa de dag kyang 'gags par gyur na /
translated: Those arousals of the mind have ceased.

original: bdag ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing rnam par rtog pa lta de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @181a *//
analyzed: bdag ni / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang / sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing rnam par rtog pa lta de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @181a *//
translated: I have taken those Blessed Buddhas as a sign, and have imagined them, and have imagined those wholesome roots, and have imagined that creation of wholesome roots, and have imagined that thought of awakening.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni /
translated: The Tathāgatas, the Saints, the genuinely and fully awake Buddhas

original: de ltar mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la rjes su dgyes pa dang / mngon par bsngags pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: de ltar mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la rjes su dgyes pa dang / mngon par bsngags pa ma mdzad do //
translated: have not rejoiced in or praised such a dedication that is done by way of a sign.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams mtshan mar byas shing rnam par rtog ste /🔽dmigs pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams mtshan mar byas shing rnam par rtog ste / dmigs pa ni /
translated: Because those Blessed Buddhas who have passed into complete nirvāṇa are taken as a sign, and are imagined,🔽and that is taken as a sign, and is imagined.

original: de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur te /
translated: That is its great object.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pas mi dmigs shing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pas mi dmigs shing /
translated: a bodhisattva great being who wants to dedicate those wholesome roots should not take as a sign the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones who have passed into complete nirvāṇa,🔽and should not imagine them.

original: mtshan ma med par byas te /
analyzed: mtshan ma med par byas te /
translated: Having made it free of signs,

original: yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: he should dedicate it.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni /
translated: The tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas

original: dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes can gyi yongs su bsngo ba don che bar ma gsungs so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dang / mtshan ma'i 'du shes can gyi yongs su bsngo ba don che bar ma gsungs so //
translated: have not said that a dedication that has a sign or a conceptualization of a sign is a great dedication.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba de ni /
translated: That dedication

original: dug can / zug rngu can te /
analyzed: dug can / zug rngu can te /
translated: is poisonous and painful.

original: 'di ltar dper na /
analyzed: 'di ltar dper na /
translated: For example,

original: kha zas bsod pa /🔽kha dog phun sum tshogs pa; dri phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod kyang dug dang 'dres par gyur na /
analyzed: kha zas bsod pa / kha dog phun sum tshogs pa; dri phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod kyang dug dang 'dres par gyur na /
translated: it is like delicious food🔽that has the perfect color and the perfect smell, but is mixed with poison.

original: kha dog dang / dri dang / ros yid du 'ong ba'ang yin mod kyi /
analyzed: kha dog dang / dri dang / ros yid du 'ong ba'ang yin mod kyi /
translated: Even though it has the perfect color, smell, and taste,

original: 'on kyang dug can du zad na /🔽de la skyes bu byis pa'i ngang tshul can /
analyzed: 'on kyang dug can du zad na / de la skyes bu byis pa'i ngang tshul can /
translated: it is still poisonous.🔽A foolish person

original: shes rab 'chal ba'i ngang tshul can ni /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal ba'i ngang tshul can ni /
translated: with a foolish nature

original: bza' bar sems te /
analyzed: bza' bar sems te /
translated: would think of eating it.

original: des de zos na'ang kha dog dang / dri dang / ro zhim par tshor mod kyi /
analyzed: des de zos na'ang kha dog dang / dri dang / ro zhim par tshor mod kyi /
translated: Even though they eat it, they experience its color, smell, and taste,

original: sdug bsngal dang @181b sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang @181b sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin par 'gyur ro //
translated: but it is painful and will ripen as pain.

original: de bzhin du 'di la log par rig pa dang / log par shes pa dang / log par bslab pa la don ma rtogs mi shes shing 'di skad du ston te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di la log par rig pa dang / log par shes pa dang / log par bslab pa la don ma rtogs mi shes shing 'di skad du ston te /
translated: In the same way, here, those with wrong understanding, wrong knowledge, and wrong training do not understand the meaning and do not know it, and they teach it like this:

original: tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar dang /
analyzed: tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar dang /
translated: 'Come, son of a good family! You should take hold of the wholesome roots of the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, of the past, future, and present, starting from their first production of the thought up until their passing into complete nirvāṇa in the element of nirvāṇa without any aggregates remaining,

original: phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
translated: and until they have passed into the realm of nirvāṇa without any remainder of the aggregates, and until the Dharma has disappeared, they will practice the perfection of wisdom and they will have created, will create, and are creating roots of virtue.

original: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
translated: and until they have passed into the realm of nirvāṇa without any remainder of the aggregates, and until the Dharma has disappeared, they will practice the perfection of concentration and they will have created, will create, and are creating roots of virtue.

original: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon @182a *//
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon @182a *//
translated: the roots of virtue that he has accumulated, is accumulating, and will accumulate while practicing the perfection of diligence;🔽the roots of virtue that he has accumulated, is accumulating, and will accumulate while practicing the perfection of patience;

original: par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
translated: the roots of virtue that he has accumulated, is accumulating, and will accumulate while practicing the perfection of discipline;

original: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
translated: the wholesome roots that he has accumulated, is accumulating, and will accumulate by practicing the perfection of generosity,🔽the wholesome roots that he has cultivated, is cultivating, and will cultivate by cultivating the four concentrations,

original: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / tshad med pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / tshad med pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur ba dang /
translated: the wholesome roots that he has cultivated, is cultivating, and will cultivate by cultivating the four immeasurables,

original: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
translated: the four formless absorptions,

original: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the five kinds of superknowledge,

original: dran pa @182b nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur ba dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa @182b nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur ba dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
translated: the roots of virtue that he has cultivated, is cultivating, and will cultivate in the four establishments of mindfulness,🔽the roots of virtue that he has cultivated, is cultivating, and will cultivate in the four right efforts,

original: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
translated: the roots of virtue that he has cultivated, is cultivating, and will cultivate in the four legs of supernatural power,

original: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad @183a *//
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad @183a *//
translated: the roots of virtue that he has manifested, manifests, and will manifest in relation to the noble eightfold path,🔽

analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / @183b mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / @183b mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways, the roots of virtue that he has accumulated,🔽accumulates, and will accumulate, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the roots of virtue that he has accumulated,🔽accumulates, and will accumulate, the four fearlessnesses, the roots of virtue that he has accumulated,

original: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: accumulates, and will accumulate, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the roots of virtue that he has accumulated,🔽accumulates, and will accumulate, great love, the roots of virtue that he has accumulated,🔽accumulates, and will accumulate, great compassion, the roots of virtue that he has accumulated,🔽accumulates, and will accumulate, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the roots of virtue that he has accumulated,🔽accumulates, and will accumulate—he dedicates all of them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
translated: the roots of virtue that he has cultivated, is cultivating, and will cultivate in the four correct knowledges;🔽the roots of virtue that he has cultivated, is cultivating, and will cultivate in great compassion;

original: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
translated: and the roots of virtue that he has cultivated, is cultivating, and will cultivate in the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas—

original: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su dag par gyur pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su dag par gyur pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the roots of virtue that have been accumulated, are being accumulated, and will be accumulated, by which many buddha realms have been purified, are being purified, and will be purified,

original: sems can mang po yongs su smin par mdzad par gyur pa dang / yongs @184a *//
analyzed: sems can mang po yongs su smin par mdzad par gyur pa dang / yongs @184a *//
translated: the many sentient beings who have been ripened, are being ripened, and will be ripened,

original: su smin par mdzad pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par gral ba'i phung po dang /
analyzed: su smin par mdzad pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par gral ba'i phung po dang /
translated: and the aggregate of morality, the aggregate of samādhi, the aggregate of wisdom, the aggregate of liberation, and the aggregate of the knowledge and vision of liberation of those buddha bhagavāns—

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa dang / nyan thos de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa rnams dang /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa dang / nyan thos de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa rnams dang /
translated: the aggregate of seeing the wisdom of complete liberation, the wisdom of omniscience, the unequaled nature, the constant abiding in equanimity, and the uncontaminated roots of virtue of those śrāvakas,

original: gang gis der dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang sangs rgyas rnams lung bstan par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: gang gis der dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang sangs rgyas rnams lung bstan par gyur pa dang /
translated: those who rejoice in those roots of virtue there, those who have rejoiced, those who will rejoice, and the buddhas, the blessed ones, who have prophesied the pratyekabuddhas,

original: lung bstan pa dang / lung bstan par 'gyur ba dang / der lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: lung bstan pa dang / lung bstan par 'gyur ba dang / der lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang /
translated: those who will prophesy, those who have prophesied, and the roots of virtue generated there by the devas, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas,

original: bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul la tshad bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
analyzed: bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul la tshad bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig /
translated: “You should gather together and add up all the roots of virtue that you have created and will create, and dedicate them to unsurpassed and perfect awakening.”

original: ces bya bar ston te /
analyzed: ces bya bar ston te /
translated: This is what he taught.

original: de ltar bsngo ba des mtshan ma'i tshul dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs @184b su bsngos na /
analyzed: de ltar bsngo ba des mtshan ma'i tshul dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs @184b su bsngos na /
translated: If you dedicate your roots of virtue in this way, using the methods of signs and reference points,

original: dug tu 'gyur ba yin /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: dug tu 'gyur ba yin / 'di lta ste /
translated: it will be like poison.🔽It is like, for example, poisoned food.

original: dper na / zas dug can de dang 'dra bar dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la yongs su bsngo ba med do //
analyzed: dper na / zas dug can de dang 'dra bar dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la yongs su bsngo ba med do //
translated: Those who have a sense of reference points do not dedicate their roots of virtue.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: dmigs pa ni; dug dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dmigs pa ni; dug dang bcas pa /
translated: Reference points are poisonous,

original: mtshan ma dang bcas pa /🔽rgyu dang bcas pa /
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bcas pa / rgyu dang bcas pa /
translated: they are full of signs,🔽they are full of causes,

original: rkyen dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: rkyen dang bcas pa ste /
translated: and they are full of conditions.

original: de de ltar yongs su bsngos na /
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su bsngos na /
translated: If you dedicate your roots of virtue in this way,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la skur par 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la skur par 'gyur /
translated: you will denigrate the Thus-Gone One.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba'ang ma yin /
translated: You will not be someone who speaks in accordance with the teachings of the Thus-Gone One.

original: chos bzhin du smra ba'ang ma yin par 'gyur te /🔽de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /🔽rigs kyi bu mos ji ltar na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ste /
analyzed: chos bzhin du smra ba'ang ma yin par 'gyur te / de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mos ji ltar na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ste /
translated: They would not be speaking in accordance with the Dharma.

original: yongs su bsngo bar bya /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo bar bya /
translated: Therefore, a son or daughter of noble family who follows the Bodhisattva Vehicle should rejoice in the sources of good of the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones of the past, present, and future, and dedicate the merit to complete knowing.

original: ji ltar na /
analyzed: ji ltar na /
translated: How should they do this?

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya skyi bar dang /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya skyi bar dang /
translated: They should rejoice in the sources of good of the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones of the past, present, and future, in all the world systems in the ten directions, from the time they first gave rise to the mind of awakening up until their unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa @185a *//
analyzed: phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa @185a *//
translated: and until they have passed into the realm of nirvāṇa without any remainder of the aggregates, and until the sublime Dharma has disappeared, they practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽Whatever roots of virtue they have created, are creating, and will create,

original: dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur ba dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur ba dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
translated: and whatever roots of virtue they have created, are creating, and will create by practicing the perfection of concentration,

original: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the roots of virtue that he has accumulated, is accumulating, and will accumulate while practicing the perfection of diligence;

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
translated: the roots of virtue that he has accumulated, is accumulating, and will accumulate while practicing the perfection of patience; the roots of virtue that he has accumulated, is accumulating, and will accumulate while practicing the perfection of discipline;

original: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
translated: the extent of the roots of virtue that he has accumulated, is accumulating, and will accumulate through practicing the perfection of generosity;

original: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba @185b dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba @185b dang /
translated: the extent of the roots of virtue that he has cultivated, is cultivating, and will cultivate through cultivating the four concentrations;

original: tshad med pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
translated: the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and whatever roots of virtue have been, will be, and are being actualized,🔽

original: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and the five kinds of supernormal knowledge.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
translated: the four establishments of mindfulness,🔽the four right efforts,🔽the four legs of miraculous power,

original: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
translated: the five faculties,🔽the five powers,🔽the seven aspects of enlightenment,🔽and the noble eightfold path.

original: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po lnga la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad @186a *//
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po lnga la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad @186a *//
translated: the roots of virtue that he has accumulated, is accumulating, and will accumulate in relation to the five faculties;🔽

original: par 'gyur ba dang / stobs lnga la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: par 'gyur ba dang / stobs lnga la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /
translated: the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the four noble truths, the four formless meditative absorptions, the four immeasurable aspirations, the four formless states of composure, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
translated: the noble eightfold path, and however much they have accumulated, are accumulating, and will accumulate roots of virtue,🔽

translated: and the dhāraṇī gateways,

translated: the roots of virtue that have been, will be, and are being accumulated through meditation on the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, the five clairvoyances, the four applications of mindfulness, the four correct exertions, the four supports for miraculous ability, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the three gateways to liberation, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the ten powers of a tathāgata, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,🔽and the roots of virtue that have been, will be, and are being accumulated through meditation on the four forms of correct understanding, the four forms of exact knowledge, the four formless states, the six supernormal powers, the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the ten powers of a tathāgata, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,🔽and the roots of virtue that have been, will be, and are being accumulated through meditation on the four forms of exact knowledge, the four forms of perfect understanding, the four formless states, the six supernormal powers, the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the ten powers of a tathāgata, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,🔽and the roots of virtue that have been, will be, and are being accumulated through meditation on the four forms of exact knowledge, the four forms of perfect understanding, the four formless states, the six supernormal powers, the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the ten powers of a tathāgata, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,

original: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsgoms te dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: and the roots of virtue that have been, will be, and are being accumulated through meditation on the four forms of exact knowledge, the four forms of perfect understanding, the four formless states, the six supernormal powers, the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the ten powers of a tathāgata, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas,🔽and the roots of virtue that have been, will be, and are being accumulated through meditation on the four forms of exact knowledge, the four forms of perfect understanding, the four formless states,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su dag par gyur pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can mang po yongs su smin par mdzad par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su dag par gyur pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can mang po yongs su smin par mdzad par gyur pa dang /
translated: The roots of virtue that have been accumulated by those who have purified many buddha realms, who are purifying them, who will purify them, who have brought many beings to full maturity,🔽who are bringing them to full maturity, and who will bring them to full maturity, as well as the aggregate of discipline, the aggregate of samādhi, the aggregate of wisdom, the aggregate of liberation,

original: yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
analyzed: yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
translated: and the aggregate of the knowledge and vision of liberation of those blessed buddhas—all of these I rejoice in.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa dang / nyan thos de dag gi @187b dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa rnams dang /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa dang / nyan thos de dag gi @187b dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa rnams dang /
translated: the aggregate of the wisdom of the vision of liberation, the wisdom of omniscience, the unequaled nature, the constant state of equanimity, and the uncontaminated roots of virtue of those śrāvakas,

original: gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar gyur ba dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang sangs rgyas rnams lung bstan par gyur pa dang /

translated: and those who rejoice in those roots of virtue, those who have rejoiced, those who will rejoice, and the buddhas, the blessed ones, who have prophesied the pratyekabuddhas,

original: lung bstan pa dang / lung bstan bar 'gyur ba dang / der lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang /

translated: the predictions, the predictions to come, and the gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas who have planted, are planting, and will plant wholesome roots,

original: bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ste /
analyzed: bskyed pa dang / bskyed par 'gyur ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ste /
translated: and rejoice in them,

original: yongs su bsngos na /
analyzed: yongs su bsngos na /
translated: and then dedicate them,

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos par 'gyur ba snyam du bslab par mi bya'o //

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa; byams pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa; byams pa /
translated: Subhūti said, “Maitreya,

translated: Here, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas who practices the perfection of wisdom, wishing not to deprecate the Tathāgata, should make a dedication like this:🔽“Just as those tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas have understood, know, and fully know with their unsurpassed buddha knowledge what the nature,🔽what the intrinsic nature, and

original: mtshan nyid gang yin pa thugs su chud de mkhyen la rab tu mkhyen cing /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gang yin pa thugs su chud de mkhyen la rab tu mkhyen cing /
translated: what the actuality of those wholesome roots are,

analyzed: chos @188a *// nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
translated: in just that way I rejoice in them.”

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Just as those Blessed Buddhas have understood, in the same way I dedicate these wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byas te de ltar yongs su bsngos na /

translated: In this way, sons of good family or daughters of good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle should dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening. Having dedicated in this way,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la skur par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la skur par mi 'gyur /
